key_features: The first Buy Now Pay Later Credit Card that allows you to split any payment and enjoy 0% interest instalments.
Interest-free auto-instalments - automatically splits your transactions into monthly instalments, so you don’t have to worry about paying all your expenses at one go.
Ease of split payments across 3 or 6 months
Earn 1% cash rebates when your monthly bill is S$1,000 or more

fees.annual_fee_waiver: Minimum Spend of S$10,000 in 1 year
fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: S$50 or 3% of the Total Balance, whichever is higher, and any overdue amount
fees.cash_advance_fee: S$15 or 8% of amount withdrawn whichever is greater
